name: The Worm Game
description:
This game was made using the learning tutorial How to make Snake in Unity (Complete Tutorial) by Zigurous. 

Then expanding the basic game with some graphics sound and UI elements. 

The game was built in less than a day and was used to refresh my unity development skills after a summer break working on other projects.

Use a gamepad or ASWD keys to move the worm around and eat food to increase its score and size. Avoid hitting the walls and eating the worm's trailing body. Press Space Bar to start or restart. Press M to toggle muting the sound.

Hope you enjoy the game.

The game is currently not mobile-friendly (you will need an external gamepad or keyboard to play)
